rooms.description: A welcoming corridor with Bohemian accents. Features a small foyer and storage.
Open space with vibrant colors and decor inspired by Bohemian style, integrating indoor plants and eclectic furniture.
Compact yet functional kitchen area featuring open shelving and a mix of traditional and modern appliances. Located to ensure proper Vastu flow by aligning the stove in the east.
Small bathroom with essential fixtures ensuring ease of movement and adherence to local building codes. Placed away from direct sunlight per Vastu guidelines.
Quiet reading nook featuring built-in bookshelves, ambient lighting, and a comfortable seating area. Positioned in the northeast for positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance aligning with north direction to invite auspicious energy. Decorated with a Bohemian-style archway.
Multiple windows positioned in strategic locations including the kitchen and living area for ample natural light while following Vastu recommendations.
